description: Whether you’re approaching granite walls, bouldering on the forest floor, or heading into town for a latte, these lightweight shorts provide four-way stretch and comfort when you’re on the move. Featuring a climbing-specific inseam gusset, a zippered thigh pocket to stash on-route essentials, two harness compatible front pockets and a secure zippered back pocket, the Valley Shorts snap closed with an adjustable ladder-lock waist belt to keep you styling on and off the rock.
name: Black Diamond Valley Shorts - Mens

specs.value: Nylon four-way Stretch woven with DWR finish - 85% Nylon, 15% Elastane, 148gsm
